Package ohos.accessibility

Class AccessibilityAbilityInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.accessibility.AccessibilityAbilityInfo

  • public class AccessibilityAbilityInfo
extends Object
    Queries information about an accessibility ability.

    This class provides methods for you to query information about a specified accessibility ability with given search criteria.Information about an accessibility ability includes the name, description, type, and supported accessibility events.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    AccessibilitySystemAbilityClient.getAbilityList(int, int)
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Accessibility#ABILITY

      Describes the capability to perform gestures.

      Describes the capability to request to control the display magnification.

      Describes the capability to request the touch exploration mode.
      static int CAPABILITY_WINDOW_CONTENT
      Describes the capability to search for the content of the active window.
      static int FEEDBACK_ALL_MASK
      Describes the accessibility ability for all feedback types.
